info.description: These are OIC Integration APIs for Brewer Management
info.title: AMP OIC APIs

tags.name: User Management
tags.description: Integration name AMSUserlist - get, update, reset Password, deactivate user operations

tags.name: Install
tags.description: Integration covering brewer installation related API's

get.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
available user lsit in the system

parameters.name: requestedAccountType
parameters.description: pass type(Distributor or Business) Account to filter results on user

parameters.name: KADAccountID
parameters.description: pass one or more optional userId string for looking up user

parameters.name: BusinessAccountID
parameters.description: pass one or more optional userId string for looking up user

parameters.description: pass one or more optional userId string for looking up user

parameters.description: pass one or more optional First Name string for looking up user

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: pass one or more optional Last Name string for looking up user

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: pass one or more optional Role string for looking up user

parameters.name: filterStatus
parameters.description: pass one or more optional Status string for looking up user

parameters.name: createdFromDt
parameters.description: pass an optional From Date string for looking up user

parameters.name: createdToDt
parameters.description: pass an optional To Date string for looking up user

get.summary: Display List of Business or KAD Accounts
get.description: API to retrieve list of Business or KAD Accounts for a User

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: pass one or more optional userId

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: pass logged in User's Role

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description: pass a variable to indicate if list of Business accounts or KAD accounts are required

parameters.name: filterpartnerAccName
parameters.description: pass optional Partner Account Name for filter

parameters.name: filterPartnerAccPartyNum
parameters.description: pass optional Partner Account Party Num for filter

parameters.name: filterAccountName
parameters.description: pass optional Office Account Name for filter

parameters.name: filterAccPartyNum
parameters.description: pass optional Office Account PartyNum for filter

parameters.name: filterCity
parameters.description: pass optional City for filter

parameters.name: filterStateProvince
parameters.description: pass optional State for filter

parameters.name: filterZipcode
parameters.description: pass optional Zipcode for filter

post.description: API to create new Business Account

parameters.name: BusinessAccount
parameters.description: JSON for New Business Account

accountPartyNum.description: return the account Party Id/Num in response

get.summary: Display Details of a Business Account or KAD Account
get.description: API to update existing Business or KAD Account

parameters.name: accountPartyNum
parameters.description: pass account Party Number to look up account in OEC

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description: pass account type to look up Distributor account Info Vs Business Account Info

patch.summary: Update an Office Account or KAD Account
patch.description: API to update Office Account details (name, address, contact, permission) or to update primary contact on a KAD account

parameters.name: accountPartyNum
parameters.description: pass account party number (unique key) to be updated

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description: pass accountType to indicate if it's KAD Account or Business Account

parameters.name: Account
parameters.description: submit Account request body to be updated
